section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Money transmission" has the meaning stated in § 12-401 of this article.
"Mortgage lender" has the meaning stated in § 11-501 of this article.
"Mortgage originator" has the meaning stated in § 11-601 of this article.

text.section: The Commissioner may adopt and enforce regulations reasonably necessary to carry out the authority and responsibility of the office of Commissioner.

section.section:
The Commissioner may participate in the establishment and implementation of a multistate automated licensing system for:
Mortgage lenders;
Mortgage originators; and
Persons who engage in money transmission.

To facilitate implementation of a multistate automated licensing system, the Commissioner may adopt regulations that waive or modify the requirements of:
Title 11, Subtitles 5 and 6 of this article with respect to mortgage lenders and mortgage originators; and
Title 12, Subtitle 4 of this article with respect to persons who engage in money transmission.
